amendment.description: Amendment requires EPA to make publicly available all data and documents relied upon by the Agency to develop estimates under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 113-174 to require EPA to make publicly available all data and documents relied upon by the Agency to develop estimates under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
